TABLE.NAME: block_lsuxe_moodles
TABLE.COMMENT: The Moodle instances that have cross enrollments.

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL for the Moodle instance

FIELD.NAME: token
FIELD.COMMENT: The token

FIELD.NAME: tokenexpire
FIELD.COMMENT: Token expiration date

FIELD.NAME: interval
FIELD.COMMENT: Default update interval

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp at which the record was modified. It is automatically set.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp at which the record was modified. It is automatically set, and defaults to 0.

FIELD.NAME: timedeleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp at which the record was deleted. It is automatically set, and defaults to 0.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Source course id

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: Source course short name

FIELD.NAME: authmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Source course auth method

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Source course group id

FIELD.NAME: groupname
FIELD.COMMENT: Source course group name

FIELD.NAME: destmoodleid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID for destination Moodle instance

FIELD.NAME: destcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Destination course id

FIELD.NAME: destcourseshortname
FIELD.COMMENT: Destination course short name

FIELD.NAME: destgroupprefix
FIELD.COMMENT: Destination group prefix

FIELD.NAME: destgroupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Destination group id

FIELD.NAME: updateinterval
FIELD.COMMENT: Update interval, how often to run in hours

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: Start time to XE this course

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: End time to XE this course

FIELD.NAME: usercreated
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the user who created this entry.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp at which the record was modified. It is automatically set.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the user who last modified this entry.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp at which the record was modified. It is automatically set, and defaults to 0.

FIELD.NAME: userdeleted
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the user who deleted this entry.

FIELD.NAME: timedeleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp at which the record was deleted. It is automatically set, and defaults to 0.

FIELD.NAME: timeprocessed
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp at which this XE was last processed
